localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With Capsule you can collaborate and leave feedback directly on top of any website. Just one click to comment, and another to share it with the world! We automatically organize your feedback in the dashboard. Click —> Comment —> Share & repeat!
blogPost.body: With Capsule you can collaborate and leave feedback directly on top of any website. Just one click to comment, and another to share it with the world! We automatically organize your feedback in the dashboard. Click —> Comment —> Share & repeat!
blogPost.title: Capsule - Visually collaborate on top of any website
blogPost.author: Tyler Hayes

localize.description: 有了Capsule，你可以直接在任何网站的顶部进行合作并留下反馈。只需点击一下就能发表评论，再点击一下就能与世界分享。我们会自动将你的反馈整理到仪表板中。点击-->评论-->分享&重复
localize.tagline: 在任何网站的顶部进行可视化协作

localize.description: 有了Capsule，你可以直接在任何網站的頂部進行合作並留下反饋。只需點擊一下就能發表評論，再點擊一下就能與世界分享。我們會自動將你的反饋整理到儀表板中。點擊-->評論-->分享&重複
localize.tagline: 在任何網站的頂部進行可視化協作

next.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.
next.title: tw-rl - Curate Twitter. Save and organize tweets or threads

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先进的twitter书签和策划工具。一旦连接起来，就可以轻松地展示tweet媒体或将线程 "循环 "在一起。使用案例：组合、博客、心情板、灵感库。
localize.tagline: 策划Twitter。保存和组织推文或线程

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先進的twitter書籤和策劃工具。一旦連接起來，就可以輕鬆地展示tweet媒體或將線程 "循環 "在一起。使用案例：組合、博客、心情板、靈感庫。
localize.tagline: 策劃Twitter。保存和組織推文或線程
